avalancheActivity.highlights: Wind slabs may form in easterly to north-easterly aspects during snow showers on Tuesday night and Wednesday.

snowpackStructure.highlights: Wind slabs may form in east to north-east aspects during snow showers on Tuesday evening and Wednesday. The older snow is wet, uniform and generally considered stable.

travelAdvisory.comment: Wind slabs could be present in most parts of the country.
travelAdvisory.highlights: Wind slabs could be present in most parts of the country.

weatherForecast.highlights: Á þriðjudagskvöld kólnar með suðvestan éljum, en hægari vindur með éljum á miðvikudag. Spáð er kólnandi veðri, rólegt og úrkomulítið á fimmtudag og föstudag.

avalancheActivity.comment: Small sluffs fell in Kirkjubólshlíð and a small avalanche in Syðridalur on Sunday 2 March.
avalancheActivity.highlights: New wind slabs can be expected in mountains due to snowfall and snowdrift from variable winds.

snowpackStructure.highlights: Snow has added and drifted in recent days. Before that, there was relatively little snow, with old stiff and stable snow in mountains.

travelAdvisory.comment: Wind slabs could be present in most parts of the country.
travelAdvisory.highlights: Wind slabs could be present in most parts of the country.

weatherForecast.highlights: Éljagangur í hægum vindi á miðvikudag. Spáð er kólnandi veðri, rólegt og úrkomulítið á fimmtudag og föstudag.

avalancheActivity.highlights: Some new snow is in the area and wind slabs could be present at high elevations.

snowpackStructure.highlights: It has snowed a bit in the area during variable winds, and snow has accumulated in gullies and lows. Wind slab formation is expected at high elevations. Older snow is considered stable.s

travelAdvisory.comment: Wind slabs could be present in most parts of the country.
travelAdvisory.highlights: Wind slabs could be present in most parts of the country.

weatherForecast.highlights: S-V-lægar áttir að mestu næstu daga og dálítil él. Hiti um og yfir frostmarki á láglendi.

avalancheActivity.comment: Small sluff released in Magnúsartindur in Oddsskarð last week.
avalancheActivity.highlights: Little snow is at low elevations but small slabs could be present at high elevations.

snowpackStructure.highlights: It snowed a little the night before Tuesday but the sun has mostly melted the new snow. Little snow is at low elevations but small slabs could be present at high elevations mountains.

travelAdvisory.comment: Wind slabs could be present in most parts of the country.
travelAdvisory.highlights: Wind slabs could be present in most parts of the country.

weatherForecast.highlights: Skýjað með köflum næstu daga og úrkomulítið. Hiti um og yfir frostmarki á láglendi.
